snippet.title: Tourism TV Commercials: A Delicate Balance Between Aural and Visual Information Load
snippet.description:
* Tourism TV Commercials: A Delicate Balance Between Aural and Visual Information Load
Steve Pan, Folker Hanusch
This article content analyzes music in tourism TV commercials from 95 regions and countries to identify their general acoustic characteristics. The objective is to offer a general guideline in the postproduction of tourism TV commercials. It is found that tourism TV commercials tend to be produced in a faster tempo with beats per minute close to 120, which is rare ...
Journal: Journal of Travel & Tourism Marketing , vol. 28, no. 5, pp. 465-480, 2011
